title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) (No. 2) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport media) (no 2) order 2023

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Meghan McSweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited
text_raw:
2. Meghan McSweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited 
at the offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with effect from 1 November 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 October, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [529] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
